scripts.docker:dev: bun scripts/write-public-ip-env.mjs && docker compose -p stack -f docker-dev.yml up web gateway traefik announce
scripts.docker:dev:ssg: bun scripts/write-public-ip-env.mjs && docker compose -p stack -f docker-dev-web.yml up --build
scripts.docker:prod: bun scripts/write-public-ip-env.mjs && docker compose -f docker-prod.yml up --build
scripts.docker:rebuild-gateway: bun scripts/write-public-ip-env.mjs && docker compose -p stack -f docker-dev.yml build gateway && docker compose -p stack -f docker-dev.yml up -d gateway
scripts.knip: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "& { Set-Location 'apps/web'; Set-Item -Path Env:KNIP -Value '1'; bunx knip }"
